title: The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
creator_credit: Norman Taurog, William H Wright, David O. Selznick and Selznick International
brief_description: In this story, we meet Tom, his aunt Polly, his cousin Sidney, girlfriend Becky, and his best friend and adviser Huckleberry Finn. Tom seems to be constantly drawn to trouble. His dangerous adventures, schoolboy pranks, and his painful cousin are highlights of this video. Based on the novel of Mark Twain.
